New Records: Shohei Ohtani broke multiple records, including 6-for-6 in a single game, 51st home run of the season, and 50th stolen base of the season
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit 3 home runs, including a 2-run home run and a 3-run home run, and had 10 RBI in the game
The Los Angeles Dodgers won the game 20-4 against the Miami Marlins
Post-Match Reflections: MLB commissioner Rob Manfred congratulated Shohei Ohtani on his achievement
Shohei Ohtani's performance secured the Los Angeles Dodgers' place in the playoffs in just 91 games played
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shohei Ohtani is recovering from Tommy John surgery and has made slugging history in the season
The game has been played for over 200 years and Shohei Ohtani is one of a kind player
